item.title: VirtIO Paravirtualized cryptographic character device for QEMU-KVM
item.description: VirtIO Paravirtualized cryptographic character device for QEMU-KVM for Operating Systems Laboratory course of Electrical and Computer Engineering School of NTUA Athens. You can find the project code on GitHub This exercise contains paradigm code for the implementation of a paravirtualized character device that exports the native /dev/crypto device of cryptodev to a QEMU VM. Client-server chat over TCP/IP sockets (/no_encryption) For testing purposes, we first implement a simple chat system based on the client-server architecture, using TCP/IP UNIX sockets.
